ParameterInfo.description: Data used to query for an existing S2clScalarRating object.

Operation.description: This performs a query for a S2clScalarRating object given a WorkspaceObject and User. If multiple S2clScalarRating objects are found, only the most recent is returned. Returned along with the rating object is the rating value and all the summary rating information properties for that WorkspaceObject to include, total ratings, average rating, total 5 star ratings, total 4 star ratings, total 3 start ratings, total 2 star ratings and total 1 star ratings. Multiple requests for scalar rating objects based on a WorkspaceObject and User can be requested by passing in a list of input structures.
Operation.name: fetchScalarRating
Operation.returnDescription:
The S2clScalarRating object identified by the input parameter clientId and the summary of ratings for the WorkspaceObject. Any failure will be returned with the clientId mapped to the partial errors. The following partial errors may be returned.
    • 146003 The "Social Scalar Rating" data could not be found.

Operation.name: fetchSendToList
Operation.returnDescription: user/group/role in send to list of the input object

Operation.name: fetchSubscriptionPreferences
Operation.returnDescription: list of preferences ordered by group.

ServiceInterface.description: This service contains operations for creating and editing content within Social Collaboration. Operations are provided to manage comments, subscriptions, notification preferences, tags and to control subscriptions.
ServiceInterface.name: SocialCollaboration

StructElement.description: Uid of object to be received from client

StructElement.description: Name of Object category
StructElement.name: categoryName

StructElement.description: Preferences list
StructElement.name: perferences

StructElement.name: clientId

StructElement.description: The WorkspaceObject UID string.
StructElement.name: objectUid

StructElement.description: The User UID string.
StructElement.name: userUid

Struct.description: The input values needed to query a S2clScalarRating object.
Struct.name: ScalarRatingRequest

StructElement.description: List of scalar rating objects and associated data. This provides the client application a means of mapping the requested clientId to the rating object.
StructElement.name: results

StructElement.description: Standard return;includes any error information.
StructElement.name: serviceData

Struct.description: List of scalar rating objects and associated data.
Struct.name: ScalarRatingResponse

StructElement.name: success

StructElement.name: commentObjectUid

StructElement.name: attrNameValueMap

StructElement.description: Indicates whether operation was successful or not where true indicates successful update

StructElement.name: msg

StructElement.name: plainText

StructElement.name: targetObjectUid

StructElement.description: Integer value of rating
StructElement.name: ratingValue

StructElement.description: Business Object Type of comment to be created. It should be one of following : S2clCommentary, S2clQuestion, S2clAnswer, S2clScalarRating, S2clToggleRating, S2clExperience or any of derived business objects
StructElement.name: commentType

StructElement.description: comment rich text as entered by user
StructElement.name: richText

StructElement.description: Vector of string uids of context objects to be set on commentary object
StructElement.name: contextObjectUids

StructElement.name: tagNameString

StructElement.description: The clientId from the Rating Request input. This value is unchanged from the input, and can be used by the caller to identify this data structure with the source input data.

StructElement.name: ratingValue

StructElement.name: total1StarRatings

StructElement.name: total2StarRatings

StructElement.name: total3StarRatings

StructElement.name: total4StarRatings
